parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.14

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns object the given object is attached to or [[objNull]] if the given object is not attached to anything.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''attachedTo''' obj

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> obj: [[Object]] - given object

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Object]] - object the given object is attached to

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[isNull]] [[attachedTo]] _obj1) [[then]] {
  [[hint]] "_obj1 is not attached to anything.";
};</code>
 

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[attachObject]], [[attachTo]], [[attachedObjects]], [[waypointAttachVehicle]], [[waypointAttachedVehicle]], [[lightAttachObject]], [[triggerAttachVehicle]], [[attachedObject]], [[detach]]
</value></part></template></root>
